April 20, 2016

Specializations Notes
Data Science (Johns Hopkins, Peng et al) Uses R
Data Analysis and Interpretation (Wesleyan) SAS &Python
Data Science at Scale (Univ Washington, Bill Howe) varied tools
Data Structures and Algorithms (UC San Diego)  
Big Data Specialization (Univ California) Hadoop etc
Executive Data Science (John Hopkins, Peng et al)  
Strategic Business Analytics (Accenture)  
Statistics with R Specialization (Duke )  
Machine Learning Specialization (Univ Washington, Carlos Guestrin) Uses Dato
Data Mining Specialization (Univ Illinois)  
Internet of Things (Univ California)
